parameters.name: Amount
parameters.description:
The number of HAVIPs that you want to create. Valid values: 1 to 10. The value can be only 1 if you specify an IP address.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: IpAddress
parameters.description: The IP address of the HAVIP.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The vSwitch ID of the HAVIP.
